newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Nepal buys kerosene from Mobil, diesel from Shell.
newsitem.headline: Nepal buys kerosene from Mobil, diesel from Shell.

text.p: State-owned Nepal Oil Corp (NOC) bought superior kerosene from US major Mobil and gas oil from European major Shell in its tenders for February deliveries, traders said on Wednesday.
They said NOC bought 30,000 tonnes of kerosene at around $274 per tonne for February 1-20 delivery on a cost-and-freight (c-and-f) basis to Madras/Vizag or Madras/Haldia on the Indian east coast.
Nepal also bought 30,000 tonnes of 1.0-percent sulphur gas oil at $239.39 per tonne for February 11-20 delivery, c-and-f Madras/Haldia, Madras Vizag, Paradeep or Paradeep/Haldia.
The tenders closed on January 12 with validity until January 14.
In its last tender, NOC bought diesel and kerosene for delivery in November at $232.80 per tonne and $249.50 per tonne respectively, c-and-f Indian east coast.
